MsgConnectFullAccessAlert: By connecting your as full access mode the game will not send you the transactions, this in order to offer a better game experience.
MsgConnectAlert: By connecting your safe way, confirmation in certain parts of the game will be required.
MsgAccountAlert: Do you want to disconnect your Burrito Battle?
MsgBattleAlert: There is a battle going on, and you won't be able to do anything else until the battle is over, you can also surrender, but this will cost you 1 life.
TleBuyStrwAlert: Do you want to buy tokens?
MsgBuyStrwAlert: The straw tokens serve you to undermine new burritos, increase them level, restore their lives, among other things, unfortunately you can only buy tokens straw once per time.
MsgMintBurritoAlert: The undermine a burrito allows you to fight other burritos and explore the map. The cost of burrito is 5 NEARs and $ 50,000 Strw. Currently, you have
MsgNoBuyStrwAlert:
Buying straw tokens takes an epoch, 
so you still have to wait to buy tokens.
DontHaveEnoughSTRWForMint: You don't have enough $STRAW Tokens to buy a burrito, you need 50000 $STRW.
DontHaveEnoughNearForMint: You don't have enough $NEARs to buy a burrito, you need 5 $NEAR.
DontHaveEnoughNearForBuyStraw: You don't have enough $NEARs to buy Straw tokens, you need 1 $NEAR.
MsgSelectedBurritoAlert: To be able to fight other burritos, you need to select one of your burritos. Go to the barn to select some burrito, or the silo to undermine a new burrito.
MsgWildBurritoAlert: A wild burrito has appeared, do you want to face him? The level and statistics of the burrito are unknown, once entering into combat if you run away, your burrito lost 1 life.
TleGoBarnAlert: Do you want to enter the barn?
MsgGoBarnAlert: Here you can see your burritos, select some burrito, cure them and level them level.
TleGoSiloAlert: Do you want to enter the silo?
MsgGoSiloAlert: Here you can mint new burritos and buy $ STRW
TleGoColiseumAlert: Do you want to enter the Coliseum?
MsgGoColiseumAlert: Here you can participate in incursions.
MsgBurritoInIncursion: Currently, one of your burritos is registered to participate in the current incursion. Do you want to go to the coliseum?
TleDeadBurritoAlert: Your burrito has run out of lives
MsgDeadBurritoAlert: The selected Burrito does not have enough life, select a different Burrito to be able to continue browsing the map or fighting.
MsgColiseumFullAccess: To participate in the incursion you need to enter "Full access" mode otherwise you will have a great disadvantage.
MsgLevelUp: To level up a burrito you must have at least 10 wins in combat.
MsgNotLives: This burrito cannot be selected because it has't lives
MsgRestoreLivesAlert: Restoring the Burrito's lives will allow you to use this Burrito again to explore the meadow and fight in battles. The cost is 1 NEAR and 30,000 $STRW. You currently have
TleEvolveAlert: Do you want to evolve this Burrito?
MsgEvolveAlert: By evolving this Burrito, it will raise its level and increase its statistics. The cost is 2 NEAR and 70,000 $STRW. You currently have
NotEnoughForRecover: You need 1 NEAR and 30,000 $STRW for recover the health of you burrito
NotEnoughForEvolve: You need 2 NEAR and 70,000 $STRW for evolve you burrito
MsgColiseumDestroyAlert:
The Coliseum suffered a lot of damage to the latest incursion so it is in reconstruction for the next incursion.
It will be ready in {0}.
MsgTakeBackBurritoAlert: The Incursion in which you registered at the end, will accept to recover your burrito and you can participate in following incursions.
MsgDeadBurrito:
Your burrito has died in battle so he can't longer fight.
 Wait for the battle to end.
MsgLosersAlert: The megaburrito has won the Incursion, luck for next.
MsgWinnersAlert: Participants have defeated the Megaburrito, press Accept to claim your reward.
MsgNoIncursionAlert: The process cannot be carried out since there is no active Incursion.
MsgStartIncursionAlert: A Incursion is an event where players can join to combat a burrito of greater power and gain rewards.
MsgNoUseBurritoAlert: This burrito has been lifeless, use some other burrito.
MsgUseBurritoAlert: Do you want to use this burrito for the Incursion?
MsgRegisteredIncursion:
You are already registered in the incursion.
Wait for it to start!
TleSurrenderAlert: Are you sure to run away?
MsgSurrenderAlert: Running away from the fight will cost your burrito a life
TleInsufficientNears: You don't have enough NEAR tokens.
MsgInsufficientNears: Currently You have {0} $NEAR tokens and the minimum required is 0.2 $NEAR tokens to make transactions
MsgInsufficientNearsMainMenu:
Currently You have {0} $NEAR tokens and the minimum required is 0.2 $NEAR tokens to make transactions.
Transfer the enough amount to be able to play.
